checked below are included in
this Incident Action Plan):

Other Attachments:

Instructions

Check appropriate forms and list other relevant documents that are
included in the IAP.

IRS 003 — Organization Assignment List

IRS 004 — Assignment List

IRS 005 — Incident Radio Communications Plan

IRS 005A — Communications List

IRS 006 — Medical Plan

IRS 007 — Incident Organization Chart

IRS 008 — Safety Message/Plan

Prepared by

* Name

* Position/Title
* Signature

Enter the name, IRS position, and signature of the person preparing
the form. Enter date (month/day/year) and time prepared (24-hour
clock).

Approved by Incident
Commander

* Name
* Signature
* Date/Time

In the case of a Unified Command, one IC may approve the IRS 002.

If additional IC signatures are used, attach a blank page.
